CommonEvent.Name: Access Granted Activity
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: General access was granted to a user or process.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Vendor Account Enabled Alert Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of any access granting to vendor accounts in direct support of PCI-DSS controls: 10.2.1 and in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 8.1.5.a-b, 8.1.6.b & 12.3.9

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP : Priv Group Access Granted Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on access granted to privileged groups (administrators, dnsadmins, domain admins, enterprise admins, schema admins) within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Priv Group Access Granted Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on access granted to privileged groups (administrators, dnsadmins, domain admins, enterprise admins, schema admins).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13 : Account Access Granted Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule directly supports GPG-13 control PMC7.3, PMC7.6, and PMC7.10 by providing details on all account access granting activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Priv Group Access Granted Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on access granted to privileged groups (administrators, dnsadmins, domain admins, enterprise admins, schema admins).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: ISO-27001: Priv Group Access Granted Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an alert and provides details on access granted to privileged groups (administrators, dnsadmins, domain admins, enterprise admins, schema admins).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP: Priv Group Access Granted Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an alert and provides details on access granted to privileged groups (administrators, dnsadmins, domain admins, enterprise admins, schema admins) according to the established list of NERC-CIP: Default Priv Groups.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: BSI:IT-G: Erlangen von Administratorenrechte
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: BSI:IT-Grundschutz: M4.21 Erlangen von Administratorenrechten durch das Linux-Kommando "su"

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: HSS: Priv Group Access Granted Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on access granted to privileged groups (administrators, dnsadmins, domain admins, enterprise admins, schema admins) within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Vendor Account Enabled Alert
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule alerts on the occurrence of any access granting to vendor accounts.
